entry.title: MC - Microporous Coverall 50 gsm Silk Fibroin - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 14.99

MC - Silk Fibroin Microporous Coverall 50 gsm - Each

The disposable coveralls are made with 50 gsm Microporous material to protect from external contaminants.

As part of your personal protective equipment (PPE) is designed to cover the whole body and your clothing to protect against dirt and dust, paint, external particles, outside contaminants or hazardous materials such as asbestos, lead paint and many other materials.

Fabricated to combine protection, long lasting protection against wear and tear, and breathability

Our coveralls are one piece and loose fitting for ease of movement, with sleeves, full leggings and a hood to cover the head.

entry.title: Five Star - Face Shield With Glasses / Screen Mask - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Five Star
Type: Disposables
Price: 4.99

MC - Front Line Medical Face Shield Clear - Each

Infectious Disease Control Face Shields are effective for use by front-line workers (medical, dental, veterinary) and convenient for general use (restaurant, retail, salon).

Engineered for protection of the facial area and associated mucous membranes (eyes, nose, mouth) from splashes, sprays, and spatter of body fluids.

Face shields fit comfortably for long periods of usage, and utilize durable, ultra-clear plastic shield material. Sterilize before reuse.
This face protection goggle is designed with transparent shield, which won't affect your view.
The screen can help to protect your face from dust, dirt, water splashing and saliva etc.
You can use it while doing manicure, pedicure, beauty, dental work etc.
Adopts high toughness ABS, the goggle and shield screen are durable and long lasting.
Compact and lightweight, easy to carry or store, won't take much space.

Specification:
Material: ABS.
Frame color: Blue, transparent.
Size: 21x6x4.6cm.

Note
There might be a bit color distortions due to different computer resolutions.
There might be a slight errors due to different hand measurement.

Package included:
1x Face protection goggle.

•
  • This face protection goggle can provide a good protect to your face
  • Block dust, water splash and provide a good impact protection
  • Convenient to wear or take off, the shield screen is mouted on the goggle

entry.title: MC - Disposable Sleeve Cover Non-Woven Blue/White - 100/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 9.99

  • Protective Disposable Sleeve Cover Non-Woven Blue/White
  • Can be used for Tattoo, Hospitality, Food industry, Medical, Lab Cleaning ETC. Excellent barrier method to protect your arms and clothes.
  • 100pcs per Pack
  • Elasticated at top and bottom to ensure a snug fit
  • Ideal for tasks requiring increased levels of hygiene and cleanliness
  • STRONG AND DURABLE – If you are looking for arm protection against nonhazardous particulate materials, you should choose arm sleeves. These disposable sleeve protectors are made from lightweight material which is also breathable so you will stay cool and protected in hot environments. Low-linting, non-shading, rot resistant, and non-allergenic that will help you to protect the arms, clothing or skin from particulates, dirt, grime and light fluid spray.
  • COMFORTABLE AND SECURE – Thanks to the elastic ends at both ends (bicep and wrist) these protective arm sleeves prevent slippage and are so comfortable to wear, so you can use them for food manufacturing and processing, general industry, fisheries, poultry, laboratories, medical purposes, and cleaning, in tattoo salons, hospitals, for painting, repair, etc.
  • DISPOSABLE ARM SLEEVE PROTECTORS – Sometimes the glove protection is not enough, that is why you need to get these disposable arm sleeve covers that are designed to cover the gap created as a barrier gown's sleeves that rise and fall with movement, so they will keep sleeves clean from dirt, dust and other contaminating products.
